Container.Name: Radicale
Container.Overview: Radicale CalDAV and CardDAV Server - Provides calendar and contact synchronization for OpenCloud. This container integrates with OpenCloud through an authenticating reverse proxy setup. Users access their calendars and contacts through CalDAV/CardDAV clients (mobile apps, Thunderbird, etc.) using OpenCloud app tokens for authentication.
Container.Requires: Requires OpenCloud container to be running first. Configure proxy.yaml in OpenCloud for Radicale integration. Both containers must be on the same Docker network.

Config.Name: HTTP Port
Config.Description: Radicale HTTP Port (internal only, proxied through OpenCloud)

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Radicale data directory for calendars and contacts storage
